FEATURE.label: HPA039513 Normal tissue immunohistochemistry summary
FEATURE.NOTE: Normal cells showed moderate to strong nuclear immunoreactivity with additional cytoplasmic staining in several cases.
Two (or more) antibodies yielding partly similar staining patterns which are partly consistent with gene/protein characterization data or consistent with limited gene/protein characterization data
FEATURE.LINK: Immunohistochemical staining of human kidney shows strong nuclear positivity in cells in tubules and cells in glomeruli.

FEATURE.label: HPA040015 Normal tissue immunohistochemistry summary
FEATURE.NOTE: Normal tissues showed moderate to strong nuclear/nucleolar and cytoplasmic staining.
Two (or more) antibodies yielding partly similar staining patterns which are partly consistent with gene/protein characterization data or consistent with limited gene/protein characterization data
FEATURE.LINK: Immunohistochemical staining of human cerebral cortex shows strong cytoplasmic and nucleolar/ nuclear positivity in neuronal cells.

FEATURE.label: HPA039513 Cancer tissue immunohistochemistry summary
FEATURE.NOTE: Malignant cells showed moderate to strong nuclear immunoreactivity with additional cytoplasmic staining in several cases.
Two (or more) antibodies yielding partly similar staining patterns which are partly consistent with gene/protein characterization data or consistent with limited gene/protein characterization data

FEATURE.label: HPA040015 Cancer tissue immunohistochemistry summary
FEATURE.NOTE: Malignant tissues showed moderate nuclear/nucleolar and cytoplasmic positivity. A few cases of malignant gliomas, melanomas, gastric, endometrial and breast cancers displayed strong positivity.
Two (or more) antibodies yielding partly similar staining patterns which are partly consistent with gene/protein characterization data or consistent with limited gene/protein characterization data

FEATURE.label: HPA039513 Cell line immunofluorescence summary
FEATURE.NOTE: Staining of the nucleus in all three cell lines.
The subcellular location is supported by literature.
FEATURE.LINK: Immunofluorescent staining of human cell line A-431 shows positivity in nucleus but not nucleoli.

FEATURE.label: HPA040015 Cell line immunofluorescence summary
FEATURE.NOTE: Staining of nucleus in all three cell lines.
The subcellular location is supported by literature.
FEATURE.LINK: Immunofluorescent staining of human cell line A-431 shows positivity in nucleus but not nucleoli.
